name: Apparel and Accessories
description: Encompasses clothing, footwear, and fashion accessories for all demographics.

name: Electronics and Appliances
description: Covers consumer electronics, home appliances, and related technological products.

name: Home Furnishings
description: Includes furniture, decor, and home textiles for residential spaces.

name: Beauty and Personal Care
description: Comprises cosmetics, skincare, haircare, and personal grooming products.

name: Grocery and Food
description: Encompasses perishable and non-perishable food items, beverages, and household consumables.

name: Sporting Goods
description: Covers equipment, apparel, and accessories for various sports and outdoor activities.

name: Toys and Games
description: Includes recreational products for children and adults, from traditional toys to board games.

name: Books and Media
description: Encompasses printed publications, e-books, music, movies, and other media content.

name: Automotive Accessories
description: Covers aftermarket parts, accessories, and maintenance products for vehicles.

name: Pet Supplies
description: Includes food, accessories, and care products for domestic animals.

name: Office Supplies
description: Comprises stationery, writing instruments, and organizational products for work environments.

name: Jewelry and Watches
description: Encompasses fine jewelry, costume jewelry, and timepieces for personal adornment.

name: Health and Wellness
description: Covers vitamins, supplements, fitness equipment, and wellness-related products.

name: Baby and Infant Products
description: Includes essentials and accessories for newborns and young children.

name: Luggage and Travel Accessories
description: Comprises suitcases, bags, and travel-related items for personal and business use.

name: Home Improvement
description: Covers tools, hardware, and materials for DIY and professional home renovation projects.

name: Outdoor and Garden
description: Includes gardening tools, outdoor furniture, and landscaping products.

name: Craft and Hobby Supplies
description: Encompasses materials and tools for various creative and recreational activities.

name: Party and Celebration
description: Covers decorations, supplies, and accessories for events and festivities.

name: Specialty Foods
description: Includes gourmet, ethnic, and niche food products for discerning consumers.

name: Eyewear
description: Comprises prescription glasses, sunglasses, and related optical products.

name: Musical Instruments
description: Covers instruments, accessories, and equipment for musicians and enthusiasts.

name: Art Supplies
description: Includes materials and tools for various artistic mediums and techniques.

name: Collectibles and Memorabilia
description: Encompasses rare items, limited editions, and nostalgic products for collectors.

name: Eco-Friendly Products
description: Covers sustainable, biodegradable, and environmentally conscious consumer goods.

name: Smart Home Devices
description: Includes connected gadgets and systems for home automation and security.

name: Specialty Beverages
description: Comprises craft drinks, premium spirits, and non-alcoholic specialty beverages.

name: Seasonal and Holiday Products
description: Covers items specifically designed for various holidays and seasonal events.

name: Personalized and Custom Products
description: Encompasses goods that can be tailored or customized to individual preferences.

name: Wearable Technology
description: Includes smart watches, fitness trackers, and other tech-integrated wearables.
